'''Kinich''' is a playable {{Dendro}} character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

A Saurian Hunter from the [[Scions of the Canopy]] with the [[Ancient Name]] {{Ancient Name|MLP|'''Malipo'''|bearer=1}}, Kinich is a taciturn individual who has a knack for calculating the price of any request &mdash; even wetwork &mdash; due to his utilitarian philosophy. He is almost always seen with the egocentric self-proclaimed "Almighty Dragonlord" [[K'uhul Ajaw]], whom he regularly quarrels with.
